source.4eccf057:
from IPython.core.display import display, HTML def display_links_tbl(queries): """ Queries: list of tuple (query, link) """ master_link = "https://www.kaggle.com/atmarouane/" table_html = "
    " for q, l in queries: link_id = master_link + l link = f"{q}" table_html += f"
  • {link}
    • " table_html += "
" display(HTML(table_html))
source.7495ede1:
queries = [
    ('Is BCG vaccination causally related to reduced COVID‐19 mortality or other factors \
like lockdown and average age of the population \
are responsible for the different mortality rates?', 'covid-19-se-bcg-vaccination'),
    ('How long does the immunity engendered by BCG last after vaccination?', 'covid-19-se-bcg-immunity-duration')]

display_links_tbl(queries)
source.56480deb:
queries = [
('Tools and studies to monitor phenotypic change and potential adaptation of the virus', 'covid-19-se-potential-adaptation-of-the-virus'),
('Effectiveness of personal protective equipment PPE and its usefulness \
to reduce risk of transmission in health care and community settings', 'covid-19-se-protecting-healthcare-community'),
('Immune response and immunity', 'covid-19-se-immunity'),
('Implementation of diagnostics and products to improve clinical processes', 'covid-19-se-improving-clinical-processes')
]

display_links_tbl(queries)
